channel.title: Snippets on Documentation for Hugo Learn Theme

item.title: Python Platform module
item.description: platform Access to underlying platform’s identifying data # Get Architecture, The function relies on the system’s file command to do the actual work. print(platform.architecture()) # >> ('64bit', '') # More reliable way to get the architecture of current interpreter is_64bits = sys.maxsize > 2**32 # >> True # Returns the machine type, e.g. 'i386'. An empty string is returned if the value cannot be determined. print(platform.machine()) # >> x86_64 # Returns the computer’s network name (may not be fully qualified!
